Instruction: Melt the butter in a large saucepan over medium heat, then add the carrots and onion, cooking and stirring until the carrots start to soften and the onion turns translucent, about 5 minutes. Add the chicken broth and water, bringing the mixture to a boil. Stir in the couscous, mixing thoroughly to prevent lumps, then cover and take off the heat. Allow the couscous to sit covered until the water is absorbed, about 5 minutes.
Mix in the raisins and serve while hot.
